text: Khodadad Jalali () is an Iranian film director and screenwriter. He is best known for winning the ″Best Director Award″ at Mediterranean Film Festival Cannes and Helsinki Festival for ‘A Baby With Red Socks’ in 2017.Iran film ‘A Baby with Red Socks’ makes it hat trick in CannesMovies from Iran honored at Mediterranean Film Festival Cannes Special Award Three Awards for ‘A Baby With Red Socks’ He also has participated in film festivals as a jury member and the head of the jury team.خداداد جلالی رئیس داوران جشنواره فیلم مدیترانه‌ای کن شد خداداد جلالی داور جشنواره بین‌المللی فیلم شیملا هند شد == Career == Jalali was born in 1972 in Tehran. He started his directing career in 1993. Jalali has written and directed several short films including some documentary and some feature films. == Awards == {| class="wikitable"|- ! Year !! Award !!
